pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Hypothesis Tests // Hypothesis tests for multivariate data. Tests for one and two mean vectors, multivariate analysis of variance, tests for one, two or more covariance matrices. References include: Mardia K.V., Kent J.T. and Bibby J.M. (1979). Multivariate Analysis. ISBN: 978-0124712522. London: Academic Press.
